attributes.action: End The Prohibition of Drugs And To Regulate A Safer Marketplace For All Currently Illegal Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reduce the criminal and social harms associated with the prohibition of drugs, we the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to end prohibition and to regulate strictly the sale and marketing of potentially dangerous and currently illegal substances perhaps via licensed pharmacists.   The costs of prohibition far outweigh any benefits.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "End The Prohibition of Drugs And To Regulate A Safer Marketplace For All Currently Illegal Drugs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12459.asp

Prime Minister's Office
